attributes.description: The CX5 is the best selling car in the Mazda range, the Carbon Edition is the top of the 2.0 range of CX5s. The CX5 Carbon Edition has a host of amazing features, some of which are, front rear park distance control, electric tail gate lift, 19 gloss black alloy wheel and tyre combo, LED daytime running lights and adaptive headlights, Smart advanced keyless access, start walkaway lock, leather/suede combo interior with dual zone climate control which blows through to the rear, heads up display, cruise control, sun roof, Apple Car Play/Android Auto, navigation, CD/Bluetooth radio, auto lights and wipers, electric front seats with a 2 position memory for the driver, lane assist with blind spot monitoring, driver attention alzwjert and smart city brake support. The CX5 comes with a 3year unlimited mileage service plan and warranty, with the option of extending and roadside assistance for 3 years.

The CX5 comes with a 3 year unlimited mileage service plan and warranty, with the option of extending and roadside assistance for 3 years.
